```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

ui <- fluidPage(
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      selectInput(
        "order",
        "Order of Clarity Levels:",
        choices = c("Original", "Reversed"),
        selected = "Original"
      )
    ),
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("barPlot")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  
  observeEvent(input$order, {
    clarity_levels <- if (input$order == "Original") {
      unique(diamonds$clarity)
    } else {
      rev(unique(diamonds$clarity))
    }
    diamonds$clarity <- factor(diamonds$clarity, levels = clarity_levels)
  })
  
  output$barPlot <- renderPlot({
    diamonds %>%
      count(cut, clarity) %>%
      ggplot(aes(x = cut, y = n, fill = clarity)) +
      geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
      labs(y = "Count", x = "Cut", fill = "Clarity") +
      theme_minimal()
  })
  
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

```
